idea: 1Auth is an early stage startup which aims to create a secure and universal solution for user authentication across web platforms. For long, the Identity and Access Management industry has been working on shared secrets which are not user-friendly and are cumbersome to implement. We are building a customer centric, standardised and secure device-based authentication solution for apps and websites and provide a seamless user experience by removing the need of login passwords. 1Auth is a Public Key Cryptography based cross-platform Authentication as a Service (AaaS) solution which will increase user experience significantly and provides a new way to manage user identity.
name: 1 AUTH TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

We started as Appex Computer Solutions in 2009, as Computer and Accessories, office products and stationary Suppliers, electronics, specialized in providing quality products to Small & Large Organizations and Institutions. In 2018 we changed our name to Appex and also started supplying to various Government Organizations, and Private Corporate Companies, and in 2019 we start our Ecommerce Company (Dee dock) Where we give many Product Rage And Services

idea:
If one can order everything from groceries to electronics, clothes, accessories, furniture and many more with just click of a button then why should fuel remain far? So the Government was looking at options to home deliver petrol and diesel to customers.

 This will ease the task of waiting in long queues at fuel stations;

A startup is solving the problem of unsafe fuel handling

and loss of fuel through spillage as well as

reducing travel time to go to fuel retail outlet to source high-speed diesel.

Also, diesel theft can be avoided by not storing diesel in plastic or metal barrels which in turn help in the economic feasibility of the projects.

Also, COVID-19 has struck our country and crowding at fuel outlets should be avoided. As a measure of safety human contact need to cut off as possible and so our initiative is helpful to reduce crowds at fuel outlets. It will also help in opening up the market and ease of procurement. Further Infra projects will save on manpower cost considerably.
name: OSO PETRO PRODUCTS PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Aajo

idea:
PA.NI is a sustainable swimwear brand that aims to re-design the experience of swimwear shopping for women in India from a frustrating process into a joyful and empowering experience. Our brand’s vision is to destigmatize swimwear and women’s bodies by designing a product that is inclusive of South Asian women’s body shapes and size, all the while offering a product made out of recuperated ghost nets. We do so by creating cuts that are universally flattering while taking into account our customer’s preferences for modesty given the cultural context. In our two years of operations, we’ve noticed the empowering impact of a perfectly-fitted product on our customers’ confidence and feeling of representation. Our mission is to empower women consumers and producers alike, which is why we have built our supply chain on 3 impact pillars: body-positivity, environmental sustainability, and artisan development, thus enabling us to support and empower women all across our supply chain.

For more information, please check our website: www.pa-ni.in
name: PA.NI Swimwear

name: ACTUEALTH
